mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "The Bite Could Be Fatal", "Retirement S/D Listings, 1984", "The First National Revisited", "Public Opinion Poll", "Film", "Scholarships, 1984", "S/D Houseboat Style", "Building A Cotton Bowl Float" and "33rd National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Ladies on the Square", "On The Record", "Advanced Dancing", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Mostly Modular", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "Current Releases" and "Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
